name: @tiger/tiger-hook
description: 用于服务监控，链路跟踪，远程调试，错误信息上报，日志上报等功能

scripts.docker: rm -rf dist && cd app/src && rm -rf public && tsc && cd ../../ && cp package.json ./dist && cp package.json ./dist/lib && cd app/web && npm run build && mkdir -p ../src/public && cp -rf dist/web/* ../src/public && mkdir -p ../../dist/src/public && cp -rf dist/web/* ../../dist/src/public && cd ../../ && cd dist && npm install && cd ../ && docker build -t tiger-hook-web .

author: hzjinbing@163.com
